entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
